item.title: Txt4
item.dc:creator: @11bravo 11bravo
item.description:
@11bravo wrote:

i made i new command for when i player tries to use starter they say somting here is the command

if(command.startsWith(“starter”)) {
yell(""+playerName+" is a noob trying to get a starter!");
txt4 =“Im a noob look at me nooby right here!!”;
}

but it get this error
client.java:7182: cannont find symbol
symbol : variable txt4
location : class client
txt4 =“my text here!!”;

how would i fix? thanks

Read full topic
